title: 2 Weeks Banned for no reason again!
body:
So i got banned once again on my other smurf for "toxic" when i didnt even write anything again.
First time i got perm banned on my first smurf now 2 weeks ban on my second smurf are you serious..


here is link to the other topic http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/faXsHil7-permanently-banned-for-no-reason


riot why is this keep happening?

I didnt even write a single word if you want further proof message me and ill show it to you this is not photoshopped or anything...

I already opened a ticket once again..

replies.body: We are aware of your accounts and are still looking into them.
Thank you i am just upset that i got banned 2 times :/

Your accounts were correctly banned for reasons other than chat, but were given the wrong ban reason, which caused an empty reform-card to show up. You should contact player support regarding your bans.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VJHI2KQy,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-06-16T23:32:13.626+0000)
>
> Your accounts were correctly banned for reasons other than chat, but were given the wrong ban reason, which caused an empty reform-card to show up. You should contact player support regarding your bans.

Once again you respond to other people so quickly but ignored me for weeks. 

I fully expect reprisal for the following statement ;
My hatred for you is unrivaled across any Riot employee. You singled me out and mistreated my case out of pure spite. You , as an individual, are one of the major reasons for my loss of faith in Riot as a company.

Didn't I remember that you were once spamming posts of you being unbanned at first due to a mistake?

Karma can be a bitch sometimes, huh.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VJHI2KQy,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-18T00:08:47.347+0000)
>
> Didn't I remember that you were once spamming posts of you being unbanned at first due to a mistake?

I was initially permabanned (From zero punishment tier btw) due to what seems to be a rogue Riot member that violated established protocol.
This was later overturned after the case was reviewed again.

I asked Tantram about it and he ignored me multiple times, despite me knowing now FOR A FACT that he knew 100% what was going on but decided NOT to tell me. He specifically chose not to assist me. 

All of that being said;
My case was grossly mishandled and it destroyed the loyalty I had to Riot.

Technically, they still have no proof that the OP **is** the person he claims to be, so I'm assuming they can't really be that open about the case for privacy reasons.
Plus, it's obvious that at least **something** went wrong there, and probably on a rather fundamental level. Even if the ban(s) were justified, empty chatlogs shouldn't really pop up in the reform card. I don't see anything suspicious about taking time to investigate an issue.

It's because your saying nothing was creating a negative experience. If enough people report you for something, then it's the red flag that what you're doing is "against the community standards"

The community standards are established by people who report people. So if a lot of people report you for negative behavior, it's because of something you said (or didn't say) and this "ruined their experience".

So when Riot says that they don't ban people when they follow the summoners code, for not talking, for being bad, etc, it's all a lie. The ones who decides who should be punished are the small minority who report you and that's all that's taken into consideration. I've had Riot employees tell me this for months now, so dont bother asking them to take back their ban. "the people have spoken" will be their answer.

I get that you're still upset about your ban, but spreading this misinformation around constantly isn't going to change it. You got banned because you wouldn't stop being negative, and it became a problem for everyone even though you were directing it at yourself. You're doing the same thing on the boards, please stop.

http://prntscr.com/bh5ahq
Here's Wobbly Jibbler saying that it doesn't matter what Rioters say is punishible or not, it's the players who report you that decide.


http://prntscr.com/bh5bc7
Here's Spine Splitter saying that it's the amount of time someone reports you for something and if they were because of the same thing (In this case, not saying anything)

http://prntscr.com/bh5afj
And this is a Quote from Princess Bubblegum saying that the Instant feedback system runs on the amount of times players report you for something.

These are not misinformation Nami, these are direct quotes that Riot's staff have been giving me. So when I say it doesn't matter that you follow the summoners code or a Rioter who says something is ok doesn't mean squat, it's becuase Wobbly Jibbler and the other who enforce punishments are saying that it doesn't matter what Rioters and the Summoners code says. This is coming from the punishment team themselves.

That is your misinterpretation of Rioters.

Those support responses do not mean the things you say they do.

So when Riot says that if people keep doing the things they were 2-week banned for, they'll get permabanned, were they lying about that? 

Because I was banned for apoligizing for everything and telling people that I suck (It's very much true, I've been told this since day one on this game for the past 3-4 years now.) and guess what? After 4 months of my 2-week ban, I'm not declared reformed and getting loot by doing absolutely nothing.

So if the quotes don't mean what I said they mean, then why are they rewarding me for my "toxic" behavior? I've been asking them why myself for a month now and they have no answers for me. They haven't even revoked my reformed status or taken away my ability to gain loot, so it's not like they don't know the blunder they made.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VJHI2KQy,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-06-16T13:53:11.513+0000)
>
> I get that you're still upset about your ban, but spreading this misinformation around constantly isn't going to change it. You got banned because you wouldn't stop being negative, and it became a problem for everyone even though you were directing it at yourself. You're doing the same thing on the boards, please stop.

He isn't spreading negativity at all, and you really don't have  proof that this ban was warranted, because automated bans are so flawed. Let's just give him the benefit of the doubt for once unless Riot proves him wrong.

Nami isn't talking about the OP, he is talking about RedTao.

OP has a legitimate concern over a potential mistake. RedToa's ban was deserved he just is unable or unwilling to accept it.

You're right in that you shouldn't jump to conclusions just because somebody is banned...
But from the specific tone of the post, I guess DTN wasn't really being assumptious, and rather  just remembered RedTao's case, which is fairly well known.
Equally well-known are RedTao's salty remarks when it comes to bans, which stem from their own misunderstanding of the system.

Frankly, DTN's post was way more polite than my answer would have been... which is part of the reason why I stopped even replying when it comes to this admittedly very special case.
pssst hey deep terror nami u hyped for Deep sea nami? ;D

I can't say for sure if this is the case here, but it's possible to receive chat logs for a non-chat related punishment (it's rare). It happens when you trigger a ban for gameplay offenses but the reports against you included the Verbal Abuse option. For information on this you'll need to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Nami i wish you had chat logs access and could {{summoner:11}}  people when necessary. Not saying this guy is lying, i just know you're way more active on the board and everyone loves a good smiting

I know and i love it. My only point was i wish Nami did too because i feel we would get more of what we all want: 
People getting called out on their bullshit saying they did nothing wrong when in fact, they're toxic assholes.
maybe cause you can be toxic pregame and psot game. if you get enough reports i guess they look into that?
No i havent even typed 1 word in pregame / after game.
So what was the correct reason?
Do you spam surrender a lot?
no
This is pissing me off slowly this has happend 2 times now on 2 of my master account in high elo in Turkey server.... Riot please do something about it
didnt you hear everyone in high elo challenger masters getting their account taken from them
Looking through some other posts I just found your previous one; just reply to Riot Tantram about the second account so he knows to look into that one too if necessary.

Riot will make up some BS excuse to have banned you.

Riot owns all accounts and they do illegitimate bans on people hoping they make new accounts and spend more money. 

When those people get banned for no reason...they tell them to 'submit ticket' lmfao and when they do, they give them some vague answer as to why they got banned with zero proof.

On my smurf I didn't say a single word in games and I got a 2 week ban for no reason. When I asked support why they told me I wasn't 'communicating with team' and afk farmed jungle when my lanes were constantly feeding. I would see people tilt and spam 'REPORT JUNGLER AFK FARMING JUNGLE' after the fact mid, support, top were 0/4 in 10 minutes.

That's after I spent a good 50 bucks in the spam of 1.5 months.

This company is a fucking rip off.

I have an account now with 0 cash on it and playing it on and will be getting my champs with IP no matter how long it takes. Riot can kiss my ass with their corrupt BS.

I love this forum.  Nearly everyday someone new posts chat logs that are barren of objectionable behavior.  The RIOTers response is always the same.  Oh yah "its something other than chat" even though you were banned for verbal.  Or yah, "you were verbally abusive in a different game that didnt get flagged".  LOL sure RIOT.  I've got a bridge to sell you.
